name: Gold Digger (Exxile4000)
description:
Welcome to the gold rush! With the promise of free wealth, you set off into the frontier to find as much gold as possible.

"Left Click" allows you to mine the terrain to your left or right

move with "WASD"

Press "E" to eat your food and restore energy

Press "Q" to cure your snake bites with antivenom (these are the green bottles) 

Remember gold is heavy, you can only carry 5 nuggets at a time and 3 pieces of food at the beginning. Maybe you can buy something to carry more? The gold pan allows you to pan for gold in certain parts of the water. Don't forget, walking in water is much more tedious than walking on land. Mind that energy miner and stock up on antivenom. It's time to strike it rich!
